sentences.sentence: She once allowed me into her inner sanctum.
sentences.translation: 有一次她让我进入她的内室。

sentences.sentence: Only the sliver of the land that is almost impossible to see from the road will remain the sanctum of his high-value crop.
sentences.translation: 只有这块地的一小片将仍是他高价值的庄稼的圣所，要从公路上看见这块地几乎不可能。
